tools.detailed_description: A workflow management framework and IDE for computational materials science that simplifies the setup, execution, and analysis of complex atomistic simulations.

tools.name: python-workflow-definition
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperability layer for scientific workflows (AiiDA, Jobflow, Pyiron)
tools.detailed_description: Defines a common Python interface for scientific workflows to enable interoperability between major materials science workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: mapp_api
tools.one_line_profile: Batch calculation tool for materials properties prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool or API designed for batch processing and calculation of materials properties, likely supporting a specific prediction project or database.

tools.name: 4d_plant_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Space-time registration method for growing plant analysis
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for the 4D (space-time) analysis of plant growth, using topological skeletons and geometric matching to register plant organs across time steps.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active-learning workflow for building machine-learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A workflow built on atomate2 and jobflow that automates the generation of machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) via active learning, targeting materials like batteries and catalysts.

tools.name: atomium
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for parsing, manipulating, and saving macromolecular structures (PDB, CIF, MMTF)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for parsing and generating standard macromolecular file formats such as .pdb, .cif, and .mmtf. It provides an object model for manipulating molecular structures.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Python package for solving Slater Koster tight-binding topological hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating electronic structure properties using the Slater-Koster tight-binding method, specifically focused on topological hamiltonians.

tools.name: aiida-siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the SIESTA DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow management system that interfaces with the SIESTA density functional theory code, enabling automated high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: materials_data_api_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: ETL scripts for aggregating data from ICSD, Materials Project, and OQMD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to query, download, and normalize materials data from major databases (ICSD, Materials Project, OQMD) for local analysis.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA framework to manage workflows involving Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP), facilitating the training and usage of ML potentials in materials simulations.

tools.name: crystcif-parse
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript parser for Crystallography CIF files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight JavaScript library for parsing Crystallographic Information Files (CIF), enabling web-based applications to read and process crystal structure data.

tools.name: blase
tools.one_line_profile: Blender visualization for ASE atoms and molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces between the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) and Blender to create high-quality 3D renderings and visualizations of atomic structures and molecules.

tools.name: ml_atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-assisted Atomate workflows for materials screening
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the Atomate workflow library that integrates machine learning techniques to assist in autonomous computational materials screening and property prediction.

tools.name: cifplayer
tools.one_line_profile: HTML5 visualization for chemical structures (CIF, POSCAR, OPTIMADE)
tools.detailed_description: A minimalistic and fast HTML5-based visualization tool for rendering chemical structures from various formats including CIF, POSCAR, and OPTIMADE JSON.

tools.name: optimade-client
tools.one_line_profile: TypeScript client for aggregating OPTIMADE providers
tools.detailed_description: An isomorphic TypeScript/JavaScript client library designed to query and aggregate data from multiple official OPTIMADE (Open Databases Integration for Materials Design) providers.

tools.name: optimade.science
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based GUI for searching OPTIMADE databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based graphical user interface acting as a 'sky-scanner' for materials science databases, allowing users to search across multiple OPTIMADE-compliant repositories.

tools.name: quantum_esperanto
tools.one_line_profile: Fast parser for VASP XML logs
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance parser written in Cython for processing XML output logs generated by the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP).

tools.name: tilde
tools.one_line_profile: Materials informatics framework for ab initio data repositories
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for managing and organizing ab initio materials science data, facilitating the creation and maintenance of data repositories.

tools.name: SAMOSA
tools.one_line_profile: Protocol for generating activated crystal structures by removing solvents from experimental data
tools.detailed_description: Structural Activation via Metal Oxidation State Analysis (SAMOSA) is a tool designed to generate activated crystal structures from experimental crystallographic information, specifically focusing on solvent removal protocols.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for automating electronic structure calculations
tools.detailed_description: MAST (MAterials Simulation Toolkit) is a workflow automation tool designed to work with pymatgen for managing and executing materials simulation tasks, particularly electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: edf-converter
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for EyeLink 1000 EDF files to MATLAB structures
tools.detailed_description: A C++ utility to convert EyeLink 1000 EDF files (eye-tracking data) into MATLAB structures, facilitating data analysis in neuroscience and psychology research.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Yambo many-body perturbation theory code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with the Yambo code, enabling automated many-body perturbation theory calculations for materials science.

tools.name: XenonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for materials informatics and transfer learning
tools.detailed_description: XenonPy is a Python library designed for materials informatics, offering capabilities for descriptor generation, transfer learning, and machine learning model building specifically for materials science applications.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for plotting ternary phase diagrams for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to draw ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) easily, providing a lightweight alternative to larger frameworks like pymatgen for this specific visualization task.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automating CASTEP material calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that provides an interface to the CASTEP DFT code, enabling automated and reproducible materials calculations and provenance tracking.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter notebooks for molecular docking protocols and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A set of interactive Jupyter Notebooks designed to perform molecular docking protocols, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: MMELON
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Molecular Embedding with Late Fusion architecture
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MMELON architecture that combines molecular representations from image, graph, and text views to learn a joint embedding for chemical and biological property prediction.

tools.name: PCMol
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-target de novo molecular generator conditioned on protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for de novo molecular generation that conditions on AlphaFold's latent protein embeddings to design molecules for specific protein targets.

tools.name: AtomicGraphNets.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic graph models for molecules and crystals in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing implementations of graph neural network models specifically designed for atomic systems like molecules and crystals.

tools.name: ChemistryFeaturization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Interface package for featurizing atomic structures in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for generating features and descriptors from atomic structures, designed to work with machine learning models in materials science and chemistry.

tools.name: SMILES Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained Molecular Fingerprint for Low Data Drug Discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the SMILES Transformer, a pre-trained model for generating molecular fingerprints from SMILES strings, useful for low-data drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit scripts for chemoinformatics tasks
tools.detailed_description: A repository of reusable Python scripts utilizing RDKit for various chemoinformatics tasks, simplifying common operations for researchers.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: Simple RDKit molecule editor GUI
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for editing molecules, built using PySide and RDKit, allowing for interactive chemical structure manipulation.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides scikit-learn compatible transformer classes for molecular vectorization and featurization using RDKit, facilitating integration into ML pipelines.

tools.name: KerasNeuralFingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Keras implementation of neural molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based implementation of neural fingerprints (graph neural networks) for operating on molecular graphs of arbitrary size.

tools.name: GNEprop
tools.one_line_profile: GNN model for antibacterial activity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based model developed to predict antibacterial activity from molecular structures, specifically for virtual screening settings.

tools.name: BloomFilterTrie
tools.one_line_profile: Data structure for colored de Bruijn graph indexing
tools.detailed_description: An alignment-free, reference-free, and incremental data structure for colored de Bruijn graphs, applied to pan-genome indexing.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised components for cheminformatics and computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised tools and pipelines designed for cheminformatics and computational chemistry tasks, facilitating reproducible workflows.

tools.name: LobsterPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic bonding analysis package for Lobster outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to perform automatic bonding analysis using outputs from the Lobster program, specifically for computational materials science and quantum chemistry.

tools.name: MaSIF
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for molecular surface interaction fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework to decipher patterns in molecular surfaces, enabling the prediction of protein-protein interactions and other surface-based properties.

tools.name: FIDDLE
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Data-Driven Pipeline for EHR data preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing pipeline that transforms structured Electronic Health Record (EHR) data into feature vectors suitable for machine learning algorithms.

tools.name: MuVI
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view latent variable model for integrating noisy feature sets
tools.detailed_description: A multi-view latent variable model with domain-informed structured sparsity, designed for integrating noisy feature sets in biological data analysis.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface bridging Psi4 and RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that connects Psi4 (quantum chemistry) and RDKit (cheminformatics), allowing for seamless workflows involving quantum mechanical calculations on molecular structures.

tools.name: OpenMolcas
tools.one_line_profile: Multiconfigurational quantum chemistry software package
tools.detailed_description: A quantum chemistry software package focused on the multiconfigurational approach to electronic structure, suitable for simulating complex chemical systems.

tools.name: cuik-molmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular featurization package for GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A specialized package for converting chemical structures into formats suitable for deep learning models, particularly graph neural networks (GNNs).

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling PDBe chemical component definitions
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools based on RDKit to process and analyze PDB chemical component definitions for small molecules.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Free-Wilson SAR analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Free-Wilson method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis using RDKit.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alerts and filtering using RDKit and ChEMBL
tools.detailed_description: A script and library to screen molecules against structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo) using RDKit and ChEMBL data, useful for library design and curation.

tools.name: solubility
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Delaney's ESOL solubility prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ESOL (Estimated SOLubility) method for predicting aqueous solubility of organic molecules using RDKit.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of useful RDKit functions and utilities
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various helper functions and utilities for working with RDKit, covering tasks like visualization, descriptor calculation, and data manipulation.

tools.name: LobsterPyGUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical User Interface for LobsterPy
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface wrapper for the LobsterPy package, facilitating the analysis of Lobster outputs for users who prefer a GUI.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated physical property calculation for polymer informatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to automate the calculation of physical properties for polymers, supporting high-throughput polymer informatics.

tools.name: DScribe
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning descriptors for atomistic systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for creating machine learning descriptors (features) for atomistic systems, including Coulomb matrix, Sine matrix, Ewald sum matrix, ACSF, SOAP, and MBTR.

tools.name: ML4SMILES
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction using substructure vector embeddings
tools.detailed_description: ML4SMILES is a tool for the automatic prediction of molecular properties. It utilizes substructure vector embeddings within a feature selection workflow to map SMILES strings to chemical properties, facilitating QSAR/QSPR modeling.

tools.name: CIDER
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical Dataset Comparator for analyzing and visualizing dataset overlaps
tools.detailed_description: ChemIcal DatasEt comparatoR (CIDER) is a Python package and Jupyter Notebook workflow for comparing chemical structure datasets. It allows users to analyze dataset size, overlap, molecular descriptor distributions, and chemical space clustering using RDKit.

tools.name: cheminformatics-microservice
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices API for essential cheminformatics operations
tools.detailed_description: A set of microservices designed to provide cheminformatics functionalities via API calls. It enables the integration of chemical data processing, format conversion, and descriptor calculation into distributed systems or web applications.

tools.name: iFeatureOmega-CLI
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive platform for generating biological and molecular features
tools.detailed_description: iFeatureOmega-CLI is the command-line version of the iFeatureOmega platform. It provides extensive functionality for generating, analyzing, and visualizing over 170 types of representations for biological sequences, 3D structures, and ligands, supporting feature extraction for bioinformatics and cheminformatics.

tools.name: cgnn
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Neural Networks for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: cgnn implements Crystal Graph Neural Networks, a deep learning framework for predicting material properties from crystal structures. It models crystals as graphs where atoms are nodes and bonds are edges, learning representations directly from the structure.

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and trees
tools.detailed_description: ScaffoldGraph is an open-source cheminformatics library built on RDKit and NetworkX. It is designed for the generation, analysis, and visualization of scaffold networks and scaffold trees, aiding in the exploration of chemical space and structure-activity relationships.

tools.name: seq2seq-fingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised deep molecular embedding for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Seq2seq Fingerprint', an unsupervised deep learning approach to generate molecular embeddings (fingerprints). It uses sequence-to-sequence models to learn fixed-length vector representations of molecules useful for downstream drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: ComFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Complete and Efficient Graph Transformers for Crystal Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ComFormer model (ICLR 2024), a graph transformer designed for crystal material property prediction. It aims to provide a complete and efficient representation of crystal structures for accurate property inference.

tools.name: Matformer
tools.one_line_profile: Periodic Graph Transformers for Crystal Material Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Matformer (NeurIPS 2022), a periodic graph transformer architecture specifically designed for modeling crystal structures and predicting their properties with high accuracy.

tools.name: molgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: molgraph is a Python library for implementing Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) specifically for molecular machine learning. It is built on top of TensorFlow and Keras, providing layers and utilities to construct and train models on molecular graph data.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-oriented optimization on the chemical space
tools.detailed_description: moldrug is a Python package designed for the optimization of molecules in chemical space, with a focus on drug discovery. It employs genetic algorithms or other optimization strategies to evolve molecular structures towards desired properties.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit utilities and visualization tools for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and helper functions to enhance the use of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks. It focuses on improving the visualization of molecules, dataframes, and chemical data analysis workflows.

tools.name: CGCNN_Paddle
tools.one_line_profile: PaddlePaddle implementation of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) model using the PaddlePaddle deep learning framework. It allows for the prediction of material properties from crystal structures within the Paddle ecosystem.

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible pipeline for molecular processing with RDKit
tools.detailed_description: MolPipeline is a Python package that integrates RDKit molecular processing into scikit-learn pipelines. It simplifies the creation of machine learning workflows for cheminformatics by providing compatible transformers for molecular standardization, fingerprinting, and descriptor calculation.

tools.name: neuraldecipher
tools.one_line_profile: Reverse-engineering extended-connectivity fingerprints to molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: Neuraldecipher is a tool for reconstructing molecular structures from their Extended-Connectivity Fingerprints (ECFPs). It uses neural networks to solve the inverse problem of mapping fingerprints back to chemical graphs, aiding in interpretability and inverse design.

tools.name: ICSG3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D inorganic crystal structure generation via representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating 3D inorganic crystal structures and predicting their properties using voxel-based representation learning.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecule viewer for chemical dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interactive interface for visualizing 2D molecular structures within Jupyter notebooks or web browsers, often used for exploring chemical datasets.

tools.name: Chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for chemoinformatics web applications
tools.detailed_description: A platform that provides a containerized environment for developing and deploying chemoinformatics-centric web applications and microservices.

tools.name: ChEMBL Beaker
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit wrapper providing chemical utilities via REST API
tools.detailed_description: A standalone web server wrapper for RDKit that exposes cheminformatics functionality (like descriptor calculation and format conversion) through a RESTful API.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes, facilitating the analysis of molecular docking results and molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry handling wrapper for RDKit reactions
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling functionality that improves the preservation and handling of stereochemistry during chemical reaction template application.

tools.name: Datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides a simplified and ergonomic API for molecular processing, manipulation, and visualization, acting as a high-level wrapper around RDKit.

tools.name: Graphium
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Graph Neural Networks for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library focused on training and scaling Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) specifically for molecular and graph-based tasks in chemistry and biology.

tools.name: molfeat
tools.one_line_profile: Hub for molecular featurizers and descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for calculating molecular features, providing a unified interface for various descriptors, fingerprints, and pre-trained embeddings.

tools.name: dbMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction based on diffusion harmonics
tools.detailed_description: A fast and modularized dimensionality reduction tool based on diffusion harmonics and graph layouts, often used for visualizing high-dimensional biological data like scRNA-seq.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug discovery and materials science
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning library that provides datasets, models, and featurizers for applications in drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology.

tools.name: DeepChem GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based graphical interface for DeepChem
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface that allows users to interact with DeepChem functionalities, such as training models and making predictions, without writing code.

tools.name: DenseGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Universal GNNs for property prediction in crystals and molecules
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network framework designed for high-performance property prediction in crystal structures and molecules, emphasizing scalability and depth.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule visualization using Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool to draw and visualize molecular structures using the Plotly graphing library, enabling interactive chemical visualizations.

tools.name: MiniMol
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained molecular fingerprinting model
tools.detailed_description: A 10M-parameter molecular fingerprinting model pre-trained on over 3300 biological and quantum tasks, designed for generating molecular embeddings.

tools.name: MolGraphEval
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for molecular graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating self-supervised learning methods for molecular graph embeddings, as presented in NeurIPS '23.

tools.name: DeepEI
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fingerprint prediction from mass spectra
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting molecular fingerprints from electron-ionization mass spectra, aiding in structure elucidation.

tools.name: PyFingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fingerprint generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating various types of molecular fingerprints, facilitating chemical similarity search and machine learning tasks.

tools.name: espsim
tools.one_line_profile: Shape and electrostatic similarity scoring
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP) similarity between molecules using RDKit, useful for drug discovery and virtual screening.

tools.name: MatDGL
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network package for crystal modeling
tools.detailed_description: A neural network package based on DGL for training custom models for crystal modeling tasks, accelerating materials science research.

tools.name: pyADA
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics package for Applicability Domain calculation of molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform Applicability Domain (AD) analysis of molecular fingerprints based on similarity calculations, useful for validating QSAR models.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecular objects
tools.detailed_description: A tool that converts XYZ atomic coordinates into RDKit Mol objects by inferring connectivity and bond orders, enabling the use of geometry-only data in cheminformatics pipelines.

tools.name: cddd
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous and Data-Driven Molecular Descriptors
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a model to generate continuous, data-driven molecular descriptors by translating equivalent chemical representations, facilitating molecular property prediction and generation.

tools.name: AQME

tools.name: e3fp

tools.name: Scopy

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for filtering and screening chemical libraries, focusing on negative design (removing undesirable compounds) for High-Throughput Screening (HTS) and Virtual Screening (VS).

tools.name: CausalFS

tools.detailed_description: An open-source package for causal feature selection and Bayesian network structure learning, providing algorithms to identify causal relationships in data.

tools.name: scikit-chem

tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics library that provides a high-level, pythonic interface to RDKit, designed to integrate seamlessly with the Scientific Python stack (numpy, pandas, scipy).

tools.name: PIDGINv3

tools.name: eMolFrag

tools.name: molecule-attention-transformer

tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Molecule Attention Transformer (MAT) architecture, designed to handle the graph-like structure of molecules for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: posebusters

tools.name: molecularGNN_smiles

tools.name: PyMKS

tools.name: MPmorph

tools.name: M3GNet

tools.name: maml

tools.name: MEGNet

tools.name: molecular_rectifier

tools.name: MolVS

tools.name: FS-Mol

tools.detailed_description: A dataset and evaluation benchmark designed to drive research in few-shot learning for molecular property prediction and graph-structured data.

tools.name: mordred
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A python-based molecular descriptor calculator capable of calculating a large number of 2D and 3D descriptors.

tools.name: MolecularTransformerEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for molecular text representations
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer neural network model trained to translate between molecular text representations and create continuous molecular embeddings.

tools.name: litmatter

tools.detailed_description: A framework for rapid experimentation and scaling of deep learning models specifically designed for molecular and crystal graph structures.

tools.name: GNNOpt

tools.detailed_description: A Universal Ensemble-Embedding Graph Neural Network designed for the direct prediction of optical spectra from crystal structures.

tools.name: ODDT

tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for drug discovery, providing methods for scoring functions, molecular descriptors, and interaction fingerprints.

tools.name: osmordred
tools.one_line_profile: C++ port of Mordred descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ implementation of the Mordred molecular descriptor calculator, enabling faster computation of molecular features.

tools.name: Lobster

tools.detailed_description: A library for training and using language models on biological sequences (proteins), enabling tasks like sequence generation, property prediction, and evolutionary analysis.

tools.name: PyPLIF-HIPPOS

tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate protein-ligand interaction fingerprints (PLIF) from docking results (AutoDock Vina/PLANTS), facilitating post-docking analysis and virtual screening.

tools.name: RDKit

tools.detailed_description: The de facto standard library for cheminformatics, providing functionality for molecule manipulation, descriptor generation, fingerprinting, and chemical reaction handling.

tools.name: RDKit.js

It facilitates the calculation of various molecular descriptors and fingerprints for chemoinformatics and machine learning applications in drug discovery and materials science.

tools.name: lobster-local

tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN). It provides a framework for learning material properties directly from the connection of atoms in the crystal, serving as a standard tool for materials property prediction.

tools.name: molplotly

tools.detailed_description: SLICES is a Python library that implements an invertible, invariant, and string-based representation for crystal structures. It is designed to facilitate inverse design and generative modeling in materials science by converting crystal structures into string formats suitable for language models like MatterGPT.

tools.name: 3D-Mol

tools.detailed_description: A numerical toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions and Monte Carlo integration methods.

tools.name: Robert
tools.one_line_profile: Automated machine learning protocols for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated machine learning in chemistry that streamlines the process from descriptors or SMILES to publication-quality results.

tools.name: GEOM
tools.one_line_profile: Energy-annotated molecular conformations dataset and utilities
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset of molecular conformations with energy annotations, essential for training machine learning models in chemistry and materials science to predict 3D structures and energetic properties.

tools.name: Gauche
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process library for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for applying Gaussian Processes to chemical data, providing uncertainty quantification and interpretability for molecular property predictions.

tools.name: RL-GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based molecular generation platform using RL
tools.detailed_description: A platform for graph-based targeted molecular generation using graph neural networks and reinforcement learning, designed to probabilistically generate new molecules with desired property profiles.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning extension library for PyTorch, widely used in scientific domains for modeling molecular graphs, crystal structures, and other structured scientific data.

tools.name: pygpc
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity and uncertainty analysis toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for sensitivity and uncertainty analysis based on Generalized Polynomial Chaos (gPC), enabling efficient quantification of uncertainties in scientific models and simulations.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular benchmark datasets and utilities
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing benchmark datasets (MoleculeNet, MolMapNet) and utilities for evaluating molecular property prediction models, facilitating standardized comparison of algorithms.

tools.name: Uncertainpy
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis toolbox for computational neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox tailored for performing uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis on computational neuroscience models, enabling the analysis of how model parameters affect outputs.

tools.name: Smart-UQ
tools.one_line_profile: C++ toolbox for uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for uncertainty quantification tasks, developed by the Advanced Composites Group at the University of Strathclyde.

tools.name: ADMET-AI
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property prediction using Chemprop models
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing training and prediction scripts for Chemprop models specifically trained on ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) datasets for drug discovery.

tools.name: Tridesclous
tools.one_line_profile: Offline and online spike sorting toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for spike sorting of extracellular recordings, offering both offline and online processing capabilities for neuroscience research.

tools.name: CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for materials
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN) for predicting material properties directly from the crystal structure.

tools.name: Uncertainty Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification and calibration
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for predictive uncertainty quantification, providing methods for calibration, metrics calculation, and visualization of uncertainty in machine learning models.

tools.name: OptBayesExpt
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal Bayesian Experiment Design package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Optimal Bayesian Experiment Design, facilitating adaptive experimentation and efficient data acquisition in scientific experiments.

tools.name: LibBEEF
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Error Estimation Functionals library for DFT
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Bayesian Error Estimation Functionals (BEEF) for use in density functional theory (DFT) codes to estimate computational errors.

tools.name: InvDesFlow-AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: An active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design that iteratively optimizes material generation towards desired properties.

tools.name: MACE
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials with higher order equivariant message passing
tools.detailed_description: MACE provides fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials using higher order equivariant message passing neural networks. It is designed for atomistic simulations in materials science and chemistry, offering high fidelity force and energy predictions.

tools.name: nablaDFT
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale Conformational Energy and Hamiltonian Prediction benchmark suite
tools.detailed_description: nablaDFT is a benchmark suite and dataset for evaluating machine learning models on large-scale conformational energy and Hamiltonian predictions. It provides tools and data to assess the accuracy of DFT surrogates.

tools.name: AEM_DIM_Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for artificial electromagnetic material inverse design
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking repository for inverse deep learning methods applied to artificial electromagnetic material design. It provides datasets and evaluation protocols for inverse design tasks.

tools.name: MM_Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for meta-material inverse design problems
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool for various meta-material inverse design problems using deep inverse solvers. It facilitates the comparison of different deep learning approaches for material structure generation.

tools.name: RockGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Wasserstein GAN for 3D porous media generation
tools.detailed_description: RockGAN implements a Wasserstein GAN with gradient penalty for generating 3D porous media structures. It serves as a tool for synthesizing realistic material microstructures for geological and material science studies.

tools.name: DLDAS_Denoising
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised deep learning for DAS data noise attenuation
tools.detailed_description: A guided unsupervised deep learning network for noise attenuation in distributed acoustic sensing (DAS) data. It provides a solver for processing seismic data to enhance signal quality.

tools.name: SSL-Resolution-Enhancement
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised Seismic Resolution Enhancement tool
tools.detailed_description: Implements a self-supervised learning approach for enhancing the resolution of seismic data. This tool aids in the processing and interpretation of subsurface geological features.

tools.name: SiameseFWI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Network for Enhanced Full Waveform Inversion
tools.detailed_description: SiameseFWI is a deep learning network designed to enhance Full Waveform Inversion (FWI). It serves as a solver for estimating subsurface velocity models from seismic data.

tools.name: MatTools
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Large Language Models for Materials Science Tools
tools.detailed_description: MatTools is a benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) when acting as agents or using tools for materials science tasks.

tools.name: CatBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark Framework for ML Interatomic Potentials in Adsorption
tools.detailed_description: CatBench is a benchmark framework for evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials specifically for adsorption energy predictions in catalysis applications.

tools.name: LeMat-GenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for generative models for materials
tools.detailed_description: LeMat-GenBench is a benchmark suite designed to evaluate generative models in the context of materials science, facilitating the comparison of different generation algorithms.

tools.name: smiles-featurizers
tools.one_line_profile: Extract Molecular SMILES embeddings from language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool to extract molecular SMILES embeddings using pre-trained language models. It serves as a utility for featurizing chemical structures for downstream machine learning tasks.

tools.name: alignnet
tools.one_line_profile: No-reference speech quality estimators with learned alignments
tools.detailed_description: AlignNet provides tools to train no-reference speech quality estimators using multiple datasets via learned, per-dataset alignments. It is a tool for scientific signal processing and audio analysis.

tools.name: Open-Catalyst-Dataset-Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for creating and analyzing the Open Catalyst Dataset
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the workflow and tools used for creating, processing, and analyzing the Open Catalyst Dataset (OCP), facilitating research in catalysis and material surface interactions.

tools.name: OpenAstrodynamics-Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for Astrodynamics Systems
tools.detailed_description: A collection of benchmarks and supplementary materials for comparing programming languages and systems in the context of next-generation astrodynamics applications.

tools.name: BAER
tools.one_line_profile: Actionable Entities Recognition Benchmark for Interactive Fiction
tools.detailed_description: BAER is a benchmark for evaluating Actionable Entities Recognition in the context of Interactive Fiction. It serves as a tool for NLP research in entity recognition and interactive environments.

tools.name: CSS
tools.one_line_profile: Drug combination sensitivity score calculation
tools.detailed_description: An R package for calculating the drug combination sensitivity score (CSS) and synergy scores. It facilitates the evaluation of drug combination sensitivity and synergy in high-throughput screening data.

tools.name: MLIP Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark platform for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A fair and transparent benchmarking framework for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs), evaluating models beyond basic error metrics to include stability and physical realism.

tools.name: MoleculeNet Geometric Lightning
tools.one_line_profile: MoleculeNet benchmarks implementation using PyTorch Lightning and Torch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing MoleculeNet benchmarks for molecular property prediction using PyTorch Lightning and Torch Geometric, facilitating reproducible evaluation of geometric deep learning models.

tools.name: MLIP Cleavage Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for MLIPs on surface stability and cleavage energy
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs) specifically on their ability to predict surface stability and cleavage energies in materials.

tools.name: MoleculeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and splits for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A collection of datasets and splitting mechanisms designed to benchmark machine learning methods for molecular properties, maintained by DeepChem.

tools.name: LAMBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Large Atomistic Models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite specifically designed for evaluating Large Atomistic Models (LAMs) in materials science, covering various properties and simulation tasks.

tools.name: MaterialsFramework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for deploying and benchmarking machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A modular Python framework designed for deploying, benchmarking, and analyzing state-of-the-art machine learning potentials and simulation workflows in materials science.

tools.name: Neutronics Material Maker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for reproducible materials in neutronics codes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for creating reproducible material definitions and standardizing their usage across various neutronics simulation codes, facilitating consistent nuclear analysis.

tools.name: MaterialsCoord
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark infrastructure for crystal structure coordination algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An infrastructure designed to benchmark and evaluate algorithms that determine crystal structure coordination environments, ensuring accuracy in structural analysis.

tools.name: Crystal GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for Crystal Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework specifically developed for benchmarking Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) applied to crystal structures, facilitating comparative analysis of different architectures.

tools.name: MLIP Audit
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and validation tool for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the benchmarking and validation of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs), ensuring their reliability and accuracy for materials simulation.

tools.name: AiM3G
tools.one_line_profile: AIRSS+M3GNet atomic structure searching tool
tools.detailed_description: An efficient atomic structure searching tool that combines Ab Initio Random Structure Searching (AIRSS) with M3GNet potentials to accelerate materials discovery.

tools.name: MacBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for multimodal language models in chemistry and materials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to probe the capabilities and limitations of multimodal language models specifically within the domains of chemistry and materials research.

tools.name: Torch-M3GNet
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch/PyG implementation of M3GNet
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch and PyTorch Geometric implementation of the M3GNet model for materials graph learning, enabling property prediction and potential development.

tools.name: Potential Benchmark Iron
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for iron interatomic potentials using LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool to test interatomic potentials for iron by evaluating several physical properties using LAMMPS simulations.

tools.name: Materials Application Domain ML
tools.one_line_profile: Package for defining ML model domains via feature dissimilarity
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for defining the applicability domain of machine learning models in materials science using feature dissimilarity metrics, aiding in uncertainty estimation.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs) for materials, facilitating the comparison of different potential models.

tools.name: abaqus-umat-for-viscoelastcity
tools.one_line_profile: Abaqus UMAT subroutine for viscoelastic material simulation
tools.detailed_description: A user material (UMAT) subroutine for Abaqus Finite Element Analysis software, designed to simulate the viscoelastic characteristics of materials.

tools.name: JARVIS-Leaderboard
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale benchmark for materials design methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite and leaderboard for evaluating various materials design methods and property prediction models, maintained by NIST as part of the JARVIS infrastructure.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn_DOS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for Density of States (DOS) prediction
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the MatDeepLearn framework specifically designed for predicting the Density of States (DOS) of materials using graph neural networks.

tools.name: SLAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential Learning App for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A sequential learning application designed to accelerate materials discovery by optimizing experimental design loops.

tools.name: WEBSLAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for the Sequential Learning App for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: The web-based deployment version of the SLAMD tool, facilitating accessible sequential learning workflows for materials science.

tools.name: idlm_Ben
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse mapping for meta-material design using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A project implementing deep learning methods for the inverse mapping problem in meta-material design.

tools.name: EGADO
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-guided analog-and-digital optimization for silicon photonics
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the edge-guided analog-and-digital optimization algorithm for the inverse design of silicon photonic devices and digital metamaterials.

tools.name: python-citrination-client
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for the Citrination API
tools.detailed_description: The official Python reference implementation for interacting with the Citrination API, enabling retrieval and management of materials data.

tools.name: materials-discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning for identifying ion conductors
tools.detailed_description: Code implementing semi-supervised learning, CAVD, BVSE, and QE-NEB methods for identifying prospective ion conductor materials.

tools.name: propti
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse problem solver for material parameter estimation
tools.detailed_description: A tool that couples simulation models with algorithms to solve the inverse problem of material parameter estimation, particularly in fire dynamics.

tools.name: AFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Automating Agentic Workflow Generation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automating and optimizing the generation of agentic workflows, applicable to constructing complex AI agents for scientific tasks.

tools.name: LLMatDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous Materials Discovery with Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) for autonomous materials discovery and design.

tools.name: MP-downloader

tools.detailed_description: A utility tool using pymatgen to download CIF files in bulk from the Materials Project website.

tools.name: inverse-molecular-design
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous generator of novel organic compounds
tools.detailed_description: An autonomous generator for novel organic compounds targeting specific physicochemical properties, accelerating materials and drug discovery.

tools.name: Chemical-Data-Download
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset downloader for MP, OQMD, AFLOW, JARVIS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and notebooks to download chemical datasets from major materials databases using Matminer and RESTful APIs.

tools.name: ASER
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale weighted eventuality knowledge graph
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale knowledge graph representing activities, states, events, and their relations, useful for commonsense reasoning and NLP tasks.

tools.name: RL-CC
tools.one_line_profile: AI-Driven Combinatorial Chemistry for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of materials discovery with extreme properties using Reinforcement Learning and Combinatorial Chemistry.

tools.name: Foundry
tools.one_line_profile: A platform and client for discovering and accessing ML-ready datasets in materials science
tools.detailed_description: Foundry simplifies the discovery and usage of machine-learning ready datasets in materials science and chemistry. It provides a Python client to easily load structured data, facilitating the development and benchmarking of ML models in the physical sciences.

tools.name: OPTIMADE Gateway
tools.one_line_profile: A gateway service for querying multiple OPTIMADE materials databases
tools.detailed_description: The OPTIMADE Gateway serves as a central entry point to query various materials databases that implement the OPTIMADE API specification. It allows users to perform federated searches across distributed repositories using a unified interface.

tools.name: OPTIMADE Validator Action
tools.one_line_profile: GitHub Action for validating OPTIMADE API implementations
tools.detailed_description: A CI/CD tool that uses the validator from optimade-python-tools to verify that a materials database API implementation conforms to the OPTIMADE specification, ensuring data integrity and standard compliance.

tools.name: PyChemia
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for materials discovery and data mining
tools.detailed_description: PyChemia is a library for materials structural search, data mining, and non-ab-initio calculations. It provides tools for manipulating crystal structures, interfacing with DFT codes, and performing global structure optimization.

tools.name: IRNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep residual regression framework for materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose deep residual regression framework designed for materials discovery, facilitating the prediction of material properties from structural or compositional data.

tools.name: MDN-GAN
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse modeling framework for microstructural materials design
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) and Mixture Density Networks (MDN) for inverse modeling in microstructural materials design, enabling the generation of microstructures with desired properties.

tools.name: EnvironmentFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for finding atomic environments in crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to identify and classify local atomic environments within crystal structures, useful for structural analysis and characterization in materials science.

tools.name: SCIGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for quantum materials discovery with structural constraints
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that integrates structural constraints to discover new quantum materials, specifically focusing on inverse design.

tools.name: AtomicStructureGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure generator using the Crystal Structure Prototype Database
tools.detailed_description: A module that generates a list of crystal structures for a user-defined system by utilizing the Crystal Structure Prototype Database (CSPD).

tools.name: spinnaker_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Build tools and firmware for the SpiNNaker neuromorphic platform
tools.detailed_description: Contains the low-level software tools, API, and firmware (SARK, SC&MP) required to operate the SpiNNaker neuromorphic computing platform.

tools.name: CAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Autonomy for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: Agent-based sequential learning software designed to accelerate materials discovery through autonomous experimental or computational campaigns.

tools.name: IM2ODE
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse Design of Materials by Multi-objective Differential Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for the inverse design of materials using multi-objective differential evolution algorithms.

tools.name: AiiDA Core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science
tools.detailed_description: The official core repository for AiiDA, a workflow manager for computational science that tracks provenance and manages calculations.

tools.name: aiida-optimade
tools.one_line_profile: OPTIMADE RESTful API implementation for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the OPTIMADE (Open Databases Integration for Materials Design) RESTful API specification for the AiiDA platform, enabling standardized data retrieval.

tools.name: MatFold
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized chemical cross-validation protocols for materials discovery models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to provide systematic insights into the performance of materials discovery models through standardized chemical cross-validation protocols, helping to evaluate model generalization.

tools.name: StructureFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure finder application
tools.detailed_description: A graphical application written in PyQt5 and Python3 for finding and organizing crystal structures, likely aiding in the management and retrieval of crystallographic data.

tools.name: analogmat
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised fingerprinting for disordered solids
tools.detailed_description: A tool for unsupervised fingerprinting of disordered solids, enabling analogical materials discovery by identifying structural similarities.

tools.name: jkitchin/vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced Python interface for VASP within ASE
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper and extension for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) to interact with the VASP DFT code, providing enhanced functionality for input generation, calculation management, and output analysis.

tools.name: MatDesINNe
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design via invertible neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for inverse materials design using Invertible Neural Networks (INNs), allowing for the generation of material structures that satisfy desired property criteria.

tools.name: iMatGen
tools.one_line_profile: Image-based generative model for inverse design of solid-state materials
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that utilizes image-based representations for the inverse design of solid-state materials, facilitating the discovery of new crystal structures.

tools.name: MateriomicTransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Generative transformer model for materials analysis and discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Generative Pretrained Autoregressive Transformer Graph Neural Network designed for the analysis and discovery of materials, leveraging attention mechanisms to model material properties and structures.

tools.name: AFLOWpi
tools.one_line_profile: Minimalist infrastructure for high-throughput materials calculations
tools.detailed_description: AFLOWpi is a minimalist infrastructure designed to manage high-throughput density functional theory (DFT) calculations. It provides a framework for automating the generation, execution, and analysis of electronic structure calculations, specifically tailored for materials science workflows.

tools.name: Materials Project API Client
tools.one_line_profile: Official API client for accessing Materials Project data
tools.detailed_description: The new API client for the Materials Project, enabling programmatic access to a vast database of computed materials properties. It allows researchers to search, retrieve, and filter materials data for analysis and machine learning applications.

tools.name: maggma
tools.one_line_profile: Building blocks for scientific data pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Maggma provides a framework for building robust scientific data pipelines. It offers tools for data aggregation, transformation, and management, specifically designed to handle the complex and heterogeneous data structures found in materials science and chemistry.

tools.name: dZiner
tools.one_line_profile: Chemist AI Agent for Rational Inverse Design of Materials
tools.detailed_description: dZiner is an AI agent designed for the rational inverse design of materials. It utilizes machine learning techniques to propose material structures or compositions that meet specific target properties, acting as a computational chemist assistant.

tools.name: material-properties-interchange
tools.one_line_profile: Database of engineering material properties with Python interface
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing a database of engineering material properties along with a Python interface for easy access and interchange. It aims to facilitate the retrieval and use of standard material property data in engineering and scientific workflows.

tools.name: Deep RL Inorganic
tools.one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning framework for inverse inorganic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of deep reinforcement learning algorithms specifically tailored for the inverse design of inorganic materials, as developed by the Olivetti Group. It enables the generation of material candidates with targeted properties.

tools.name: SimSite3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D structure database search tool for protein-ligand binding sites
tools.detailed_description: Software tools designed to search a database of three-dimensional structures (PDB format) to identify protein-ligand binding sites with steric and chemical similarities to a query site.

tools.name: PyMod
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence similarity searches and homology modeling
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that acts as an interface for sequence similarity searches (BLAST), multiple sequence/structure alignments (Clustal, MUSCLE), and homology modeling (MODELLER).

tools.name: RCSB Embedding Model
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding model for macromolecular structure similarity search
tools.detailed_description: A tool from RCSB PDB for generating embeddings to facilitate structure similarity searches in macromolecular databases.

tools.name: aflow-api
tools.one_line_profile: Python API wrapper for the AFLOW materials database
tools.detailed_description: A Python API that wraps the AFLUX API language to facilitate querying and retrieving data from the AFLOW library of materials properties.

tools.name: MatInvent
tools.one_line_profile: Generative diffusion models with RL for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: A framework for accelerating inverse materials design using generative diffusion models combined with reinforcement learning, developed by the Schwaller Group.

tools.name: matgen
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design software for novel compound generation
tools.detailed_description: Software for inverse materials design capable of proposing novel materials with different elemental compositions and crystal structures, supporting decision support at pre-synthetic stages.

tools.name: mat_discover
tools.one_line_profile: Materials discovery algorithm for exploring chemical spaces
tools.detailed_description: A materials discovery algorithm designed to explore high-performance candidates in new chemical spaces, aiding in the identification of novel materials.

tools.name: BLOX
tools.one_line_profile: BoundLess Objective-free eXploration for materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing BoundLess Objective-free eXploration (BLOX) to discover out-of-trend materials with desirable properties using machine learning.

tools.name: MDTS
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Design using Monte Carlo Tree Search
tools.detailed_description: A tool for materials design that employs Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) to efficiently navigate chemical space and identify candidate materials.

tools.name: InvDesFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design framework for high-temperature superconducting materials
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating generative models, stability models, and property prediction models for the inverse design of high-temperature superconducting materials.

tools.name: Perovskite-Electronic-Structure-Feature-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Feature extraction toolkit for perovskite electronic structures in electrocatalyst discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of an adaptive machine learning strategy for accelerating the discovery of perovskite electrocatalysts. It focuses on calculating and extracting electronic structure features specific to perovskite materials to support downstream machine learning predictions.

tools.name: GAN-MDN
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse modeling framework for microstructural materials design using GAN and MDN
tools.detailed_description: A general framework that combines Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) and Mixture Density Networks (MDN) for inverse modeling tasks in microstructural materials design. It facilitates the generation of material microstructures with desired properties.
